q: Republican 2012 presidential hopefuls to appear at the annual gathering. Michele Bachmann , a Minnesota Republican, is set to keynote the March for Life Rose Dinner Monday night. Earlier Monday, Rick Santorum tweeted, Just arrived at the March for Life on the Mall- cold but hearty mostly young folks! Well-known in socially conservative circles, Mike Pence has spoken at the march every year since 2001, when he was first sworn into Congress.
